title: BRAND NEW 2 BED 2 BATHS WITH GRANITE, STAINLESS, W/D IN UNIT, DOG OK!
posting_body: Gorgeous, brand new 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom units in Ravenswood available now!
Be the first to live in these condo-quality apartments in the heart of Ravenswood.
A "Walker's Paradise" 95/100 Walk Score, this building is nestled between Lincoln Square and the heart of Ravenswood.
Enjoy nearby shops, restaurants and farmers market; plus easy access to Mariano's, gyms, Winnemac Park and more.
Short walk to the Damen Brown Line and Ravenswood Metra!
- Beautiful new kitchens with quartz counters, custom cabinetry
- Stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave
- Gorgeous bathrooms with subway tile, rain shower head, Bluetooth smart mirrors
- 10 foot ceilings and some units with floor-to-ceiling windows
- Large shared roof deck with grills, hammocks, and skyline views
- Dog wash station and dog run
- Package receiving lockers and Tide dry cleaning lockers, bike storage
- Heated garage parking available for rent
PLEASE CALL OR TEXT ME AT 847-220-2948 FOR FASTEST RESPONSE!
